languages.text: "Оценка его личности затруднена. Дух брата Авеля не таков, как у большинства людей. Техносоратники Шестерни зовут таких людей "тихими". Он обладает высоким интеллектом, однако не склонен к коммуникации".

traits.locale_text: "Оценка его личности затруднена. Дух брата Авеля не таков, как у большинства людей. Мои братья-генеторы зовут таких людей "тихими". Он обладает высоким интеллектом, однако не склонен к коммуникации".
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: "Assessing his personality is difficult. The spirit of Brother Abel is different from that of most people. Tech-comrades of the Cog call such persons 'quiet ones.' He possesses significant intellect but shuns communication."
languages.original_text: "Оценка его личности затруднена. Дух брата Авеля не таков, как у большинства людей. Техносоратники Шестерни зовут таких людей "тихими". Он обладает высоким интеллектом, однако не склонен к коммуникации".

traits.locale_text: "Assessing his personality is difficult. The spirit of brother Abel is different from that of most people. My Genetor brothers call such persons "quiet ones". He possesses significant intellect but shuns communication."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Assessing his personality is difficult. The spirit of brother Abel is different from that of most people. My Genetor brothers call such persons "quiet ones". He possesses significant intellect but shuns communication."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Assessing his personality is difficult. The spirit of Brother Abel is different from that of most people. My Genetor brothers call such persons 'quiet ones.' He possesses significant intellect but shuns communication."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Assessing his personality is difficult. The spirit of Brother Abel is different from that of most people. Brothers of the Cog call such persons 'quiet ones.' He possesses significant intellect but shuns communication."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Assessing his personality is difficult. The spirit of Brother Abel is different from that of most people. Tech-comrades of the Cog call such persons 'quiet ones.' He possesses significant intellect but shuns communication."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: “评估他的个性非常困难。亚伯兄弟的精神与绝大多数人不同，齿轮祭司将称这样的人为‘寡言者’。他的智力水平极为出色，但却不愿与人交流。”
languages.original_text: "Assessing his personality is difficult. The spirit of Brother Abel is different from that of most people. Tech-comrades of the Cog call such persons 'quiet ones.' He possesses significant intellect but shuns communication."

traits.locale_text: “评估他的个性非常困难。亚伯兄弟的精神与绝大多数人不同，齿轮兄弟会称这样的人为‘寡言者’。他的智力水平极为出色，但却不愿与人交流。”
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: «Evaluar su personalidad es difícil. El espíritu del hermano Abel es diferente al de la mayoría de la gente. Los tecnocamaradas del engranaje llaman "callados" a estas personas. Su intelecto es considerable, pero aborrece la comunicación».
languages.original_text: "Assessing his personality is difficult. The spirit of Brother Abel is different from that of most people. Tech-comrades of the Cog call such persons 'quiet ones.' He possesses significant intellect but shuns communication."

traits.locale_text: «Evaluar su personalidad es difícil. El espíritu del hermano Abel es diferente al de la mayoría de la gente. Los hermanos del engranaje llaman "callados" a estas personas. Su intelecto es considerable, pero aborrece la comunicación».
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: 「彼の個性を評価するのは難しい。ブラザー・アベルの精神は普通の者とは異なる。歯車の技術の同志たちはこのような人物を『静かなる者』と呼ぶ。彼は重要な知性を持っているが、コミュニケーションを避けている」
languages.original_text: "Assessing his personality is difficult. The spirit of Brother Abel is different from that of most people. Tech-comrades of the Cog call such persons 'quiet ones.' He possesses significant intellect but shuns communication."

traits.locale_text: 「彼の個性を評価するのは難しい。ブラザー・アベルの精神は普通の者とは異なる。歯車の技術の同志たちはこのような人物を『静かなる者』と呼ぶ。彼は重要な知性を持っているが、コミュニケーションを避けている」
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: "Es ist schwierig, seine Persönlichkeit zu bewerten. Bruder Abels Seele unterscheidet sich von denen der meisten anderen. Techkameraden nennen solche Personen 'Stille'. Er besitzt einen beträchtlichen Intellekt, scheut jedoch die Kommunikation."
languages.original_text: "Assessing his personality is difficult. The spirit of Brother Abel is different from that of most people. Tech-comrades of the Cog call such persons 'quiet ones.' He possesses significant intellect but shuns communication."

traits.locale_text: "Es ist schwierig, seine Persönlichkeit zu bewerten. Bruder Abels Seele unterscheidet sich von denen der meisten anderen. Brüder des Zahnrads nennen solche Personen 'Stille'. Er besitzt einen beträchtlichen Intellekt, scheut jedoch die Kommunikation."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: « Sa personnalité est difficile à cerner. L'esprit de frère Abel est différent de la plupart des autres. Les technoconfrères du Rouage surnomment les gens comme lui des "silencieux". Il est particulièrement intelligent, mais rejette toute forme de communication. »
languages.original_text: "Assessing his personality is difficult. The spirit of Brother Abel is different from that of most people. Tech-comrades of the Cog call such persons 'quiet ones.' He possesses significant intellect but shuns communication."

traits.locale_text: « Sa personnalité est difficile à cerner. L'esprit de frère Abel est différent de la plupart des autres. Les frères du Rouage surnomment les gens comme lui des "silencieux". Il est particulièrement intelligent, mais rejette toute forme de communication. »
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.original_text: "Assessing his personality is difficult. The spirit of Brother Abel is different from that of most people. Tech-comrades of the Cog call such persons 'quiet ones.' He possesses significant intellect but shuns communication."

languages.text: "Kişiliği üzerine değerlendirmede bulunmak güç. Kardeş Abel'in ruhu, çoğu insandan farklıdır. Dişli'deki tekno yoldaşlarım, bu tür kimseleri 'sessizler' olarak tanımlar. Üst düzey bir zekâya sahip olsa da iletişimden uzak durur."
languages.original_text: "Assessing his personality is difficult. The spirit of Brother Abel is different from that of most people. Tech-comrades of the Cog call such persons 'quiet ones.' He possesses significant intellect but shuns communication."

traits.locale_text: "Kişiliği üzerine değerlendirmede bulunmak güç. Kardeş Abel'in ruhu çoğu insandan farklıdır. Dişli'deki tekno yoldaşlarım bu tip kişileri 'sessizler' olarak tanımlar. Üst düzey bir zekâya sahip olsa da iletişimden uzak durur."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion
